initSqlList: CREATE TABLE  `Cooperation_DatasourceSql` (`strSqlId` varchar(200) NOT NULL,  `strSql` varchar(2000) NOT NULL,`dtCreateTime` DATETIME NOT NULL,`strState` varchar(45) NOT NULL,`strProjectDescription` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`strSqlId`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
